overview: "I love big dicks, and I cannot lie!" -- Any objections to that? Didn't think so ... and so to help fuel your fantasies, Falcon has opened the vaults to bring you the finest collection of the industry's longest, thickest and juiciest cocks.  You've got 36 -- count 'em -- 36 of the most noteworthy Falcon cocks from the likes of horse-hung studs Tom Steele, Dick Masters, Rick Donovan and Chad Douglas -- plus the legendary John Holmes -- to newbie superstars Chad Hunt and Barrett Long! 16 Massive Cock scenes crammed onto 3 Discs.
